trans-unit.target: TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_SEQ_00<tab>Tonaxia is beside herself in giggling glee.

TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_SEQ_01<tab>Despite her attempts to play innocent, it is evident that Tonaxia is in need of ingredients for her latest prank. Strike out for Larkscall; slay a morbol, an old-growth treant, and two molted ziz; and harvest the malodorous items she seeks─a phial of morbol bile, a rotting acorn, and two phials of ziz venom, respectively.
TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_SEQ_02<tab>The unpleasant creatures are no more, and their unpleasant remains are yours. Deliver the aforementioned goods to Tonaxia.

TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_SEQ_03<tab>Tonaxia is pleased to receive the items she requested, and promises that you will not be the victim of her foul-smelling plot─provided, of course, you continue to do her bidding.
TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_TODO_00<tab>Defeat a morbol to obtain a phial of morbol bile.
TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_TODO_01<tab>Defeat an old-growth treant to obtain a rotting acorn.
TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_TODO_02<tab>Defeat molted ziz to obtain phials of ziz venom.
TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the requested goods to Tonaxia.
TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_TONAXIA_000_000<tab>This might be this one's most ingenious trick ever! This one cannot wait to see walking one's face when this one─oh?
TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_TONAXIA_000_001<tab>Trick? This one said nothing of the sort. This one thinks walking one's ears are the ones playing tricks.
TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_TONAXIA_000_002<tab>But perhaps walking one could help this one gather some valuable ingredients...since walking one seems to have free hands.

TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_TONAXIA_000_003<tab>This one requires one phial of morbol bile, one rotten treant acorn, and two phials of ziz venom─the stinkier, the better! Why, walking one asks? That is...ah, a secret.
TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_TONAXIA_000_004<tab>Larkscall is full of stinky ones. Walking one will find everything this one needs there.

TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_TONAXIA_000_010<tab>This one requires one phial of morbol bile, one rotten treant acorn, and two phials of ziz venom─the stinkier, the better! Why? Did this one not say it was a secret?
TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_TONAXIA_000_011<tab>Larkscall is full of stinky ones. Walking one will find everything this one needs there.
TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_TONAXIA_000_020<tab>Well, did walking one find what this one needs from stinky ones?
TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_TONAXIA_000_030<tab>Perfect! Yes, this will be the stinkiest trick ever! Tee hee hee!
TEXT_BANSYL102_01258_TONAXIA_000_031<tab>Do not worry, walking one, this one will not play it on walking one. As long as walking one keeps doing what this one says. Tee hee!
